Name: SwipeView
Description: A container that reveals contextual actions when swiped from edges.

Properties.Name: Threshold
Properties.Description: Swipe travel required to trigger items.

Properties.Name: LeftItems
Properties.Description: Swipe actions shown when swiping from the left.

Properties.Name: RightItems
Properties.Description: Swipe actions shown when swiping from the right.

Properties.Name: TopItems
Properties.Description: Swipe actions shown when swiping from the top.

Properties.Name: BottomItems
Properties.Description: Swipe actions shown when swiping from the bottom.

Helpers.Description: Sets the swipe threshold with animation support.
